NSIS_TR_A_H: NSIS Traceability data of band A and H
NSIS_TR_A_H_EXCLUSIVE: NSIS Traceability data of range A and H excluding vaccines (J07), orphan drugs, innovative oncological drugs, innovative non-oncological drugs, medicinal gases (V03AN)
NSIS_TR_A_H_V03AN: Traceability data of band A and H for medical gases (V03AN)
NSIS_TR_A_H_INN_ONC: NSIS Traceability data of level A and H for innovative  drugs
NSIS_TR_A_H_INN_NON_ONC: NSIS Traceability data of level A and H for innovative  drugs
MARKET_SHARES_EXCLUSIVE: Calculation of market shares for direct purchases excluding vaccines (J07), orphan drugs, innovative oncological drugs, innovative non-oncological drugs, medical gases (V03AN)
MARKET_SHARES_MEDICINE_GAS: Calculation of market shares for direct purchases of medical gases (V03AN)
MARKET_SHARES_INN_ONC: Calculation of market shares for direct purchases related to innovative drugs
MARKET_SHARES_INN_NON_ONC: Calculation of market shares for direct purchases related to innovative drugs
SHELF_TOT_SIS: Total shelf amount due by the company (SIS code)
SHELF_SHARE_REGION: Shelf quota from to the Regions
SHELF.allFields.valoriTracciaNonInnovati: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative indications
SHELF.allFields.valoriTracciaInnovativi: NSIS-traceable values relating to innovative indications
SHELF.allFields.valoriTraccia: Values reported in the NSIS-traceability stream
SHELF.allFields.valoreTraccia: NSIS-traceability values relating to innovative indications
SHELF.allFields.pctInnoTettiAccordiPV: Percentage indicating the share of the volume price payback to refer to innovative indications
SHELF.allFields.pctInnovativiMEA: Percentage indicating the share of MEAs to refer to innovative indications
SHELF.allFields.pb5ClasseANonInnov: 5% payback amount not under agreement class A for non-innovative indications (A)
SHELF.allFields.pb5ClasseAInnov: 5% payback amount not under agreement class A for innovative indications (B)
SHELF.allFields.pb5ClasseHNonInnov: 5% payback amount not under agreement class H for non-innovative indications (C)
SHELF.allFields.pb5ClasseHInnov: 5% payback amount not covered by class H for innovative indications (D)
SHELF.allFields.pbManovraNonInnov: Maneuver payback amount for non-innovative indications (E)
SHELF.allFields.pbManovraInnov: Maneuver payback amount for innovative indications (F)
SHELF.allFields.valoriNCNonInnov: Amount of credit notes for non-innovative indications (G)
SHELF.allFields.valoriNCInnov: Amount of credit notes for innovative indications (H)
SHELF.allFields.importoPBMeaNonInno: MEA payback amount for non-innovative indications (I)
SHELF.allFields.importoPBMeaInno: MEA payback amount for innovative indications (L)
SHELF.allFields.pbTettiAccordiPVNonInno: Payback amount for product ceilings and price-volume agreements for non-innovative indications (M)
SHELF.allFields.pbTettiAccordiPVInno: Payback amount for product ceilings and price-volume agreements for innovative indications (N)
SHELF.allFields.pbDirNonInno: Total amount of paybacks for non-innovative indications (A+C+E+G+I+M)
SHELF.allFields.pbDirInno: Total amount of paybacks for innovative indications (B+D+F+H+L+N)
SHELF.allFields.spesaNettoPBeFranchigia: Expenditure net of paybacks and deductible
SHELF.allFields.spesaPerQuotaMercato: Expense for the calculation of the market share
SHELF.allFields.totaleMercato: Total on which to calculate the market share
SHELF.allFields.sfondamento: Total amount to be written off
SHELF.allFields.no: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative indications for non-orphan drugs (€)
SHELF.allFields.si: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative for orphan drugs (€)
SHELF.allFields.to: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative (including orphan drugs, vaccines (J07) and payback) (€)
SHELF.allFields.importoRipianoNoV03AN: Shelf amount excluding innovative drugs and medical gases (V03AN)
SHELF.allFields.importoRipianoNoV03ANDMT: Shelf amount excluding innovative drugs and medical gases (V03AN) pursuant to the Tetti Ministerial Decree (€)
SHELF.allFields.importoRipianoV03AN: Shelf amount due to medical gases (V03AN)
SHELF.allFields.importoRipianoInnovNonOn: Shelf amount for innovative non-oncological drugs
SHELF.allFields.ripianoTotale: Total amount of shelf payable by the company
SHELF.allFields.ripianoTotaleTetto8: Total amount of shelf payable by the company pursuant to the Tetti Ministerial Decree
SHELF.allFieldsMenu2.valoreTraccia: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative indications
SHELF.allFieldsMenu3.valoreTraccia: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative indications
SHELF.allFieldsMenu4.valoreTraccia: NSIS-traceability values relating to innovative indications

SHELF.allFieldsMenu6.importoPB: Total amount of paybacks for non-innovative and non-orphan indications

SHELF.allFieldsMenu7.to: NSIS-traceability values relating to non-innovative (including orphan drugs, vaccines (J07) and payback) (€)
